channel.title: eyerub on Four Sore Eyes

item.title: Condecision
item.description: The following is a running list of words inspired by The Dictionary of Obscure Sorrows by John Koenig Condecision: A state where decision making is impeded for an awareness that whatever decision is made the consequences are likely to have a net negative outcome. Emplosion: An occurance when ones empathic sensibilities contribute to a state condecision to the point of emotional, cognitive and behavioral collapse. Nuclear Emplosion A special case of emplosion when ones empathic sensibilities are spread across 2 or more others whose needs are in conflict each other.
